title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions               Current Conditions          Alerts    Information        Closure of Stone Steps in Lower Town  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Closure of Stone Steps in Lower Town  The Stone Steps in Lower Town Harpers Ferry, connecting High Street and Public Way, will be closed for restoration work Mon-Fri and will reopen on weekends. This is part of the Appalachian Trail and hikers will need to detour to reconnect with the trail          Construction on Potomac Street  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Construction on Potomac Street  Parking at the Harpers Ferry Train Station is limited. Visitors are encouraged to park at the main Visitor Center at 171 Shoreline Drive and ride the shuttle bus into Lower Town. Click the "More" link for additional information about parking. more         Â    Weather   To see the current weather or the forecasted weather for Harpers Ferry, please visit the National Weather Service site (set to zip code 25425).
